subject: Basketball
Disc Jockeys
lead_paragraph: More than a decade since his last N.B.A. game, Rony Seikaly has re-emerged as an up-and-coming D.J., playing a growing number of gigs at trendy clubs from Las Vegas to Ibiza, Spain.
snippet: More than a decade since his last N.B.A. game, Rony Seikaly has re-emerged as an up-and-coming D.J., playing a growing number of gigs at trendy clubs from Las Vegas to Ibiza, Spain.
